instruction: Compose a rap verse that captures the feeling of happiness.
output:
Verse:
Jump out of bed, start living my dreams,
Feeling alive and nothing can stop me.
Think happy thoughts and never will I be,
A slave to my worries, free I be.

Spreading love to everyone around me,
Cannot contain the joy that I feel.
No unhappiness will come near me,
My life's choice, it has been sealed.

Chorus:
Got that happiness, feel it in my bones.
Hopin' it'll spread all around like a stone.
Keep livin' my life with that joy so great,
No matter what comes, happiness I will make.
